dimension: 19 1/4 x 16 in. (48.9 x 40.64 cm) (image, sheet) portfolio box 21 x 17 5/8 x 1 1/8 in. (closed)
title: I'm Cold Billy, Can't Stop Shaking, from "Lilacs and Smoke"
marks: Signature, Title, Date, Edition, and Chop lower margin in pencil: [Nicolas Africano 1990]; a
description: from a suite of 13 color lithographs housed in a beige linen portfolio box, titled by hand individually by the artist, with an acrylic sumi ink wash; man standing wrapped in cloth from chest to calves
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
